        public void addCustomerButtonHandler​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                              throws java.lang.Exception

      • deleteCustomerButtonHandler

        public void deleteCustomerButtonHandler​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Button handler for the delete button. Takes tableview selection and uses a sql statement to delete it from the database. Also deletes any associated appointments for the customer.
        Parameters:
        event -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getDivision

        public void getDivision​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Button handler for the get division button. Filters the selections in the division combo box based on the selection in the country combo box.
        Parameters:
        event -

      • customerTableViewMouseClick

        public void customerTableViewMouseClick​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Mouse click handler for the customer Tableview. Populates text fields with selection from the customer table and disables the add customer button.
